name: Google Takeout
notes: Comprehensive export tool for most Google services (Gmail, Drive, Photos, Calendar, YouTube, etc.). You can select specific products and data types. Larger exports may take longer and be delivered via email link. Review the export options carefully for specific data types.

name: Facebook
notes: The 'Download Your Information' (DYI) tool allows you to get a copy of your content and information, including posts, photos, comments, activity logs, messages, and facial recognition data. You can customize the date range, format, and media quality. Files are delivered as an archive for download.

name: Twitter (X)
notes: Your 'Twitter Data' archive includes tweets, direct messages, media (photos/videos), followers, following, moments, and more. It may take a few hours for your archive to be ready for download, and you'll be notified via email when it's available.

name: Instagram
notes: Request your data through your settings ('Your Activity' > 'Download Your Information') or the mobile app. Photos and videos will be organized in separate folders within the downloaded archive. Processing time depends on your data volume, and the download link is typically valid for 4 days.

name: LinkedIn
notes: LinkedIn offers multiple data archives: connections, messages, job applications, account activity, recommendations, etc. You can select specific categories for export. Downloads are typically available quickly via email link.

name: GitHub
notes: Account data can be downloaded from your 'Account Data' settings. For repositories, standard Git cloning operations are used for code. Additional repository data like issues, pull requests, etc., can be exported via GitHub's API or third-party tools.

name: Spotify
notes: Found under 'Download your data' in privacy settings. This includes personal data, streaming history, and user-generated content. Due to the volume of streaming data, it can take up to 30 days for your full archive to be prepared and sent via email. Make sure to check spam.

name: Reddit
notes: Your personal data file includes posts, comments, messages, saved content, and moderating actions. The archive is generated periodically and may take some time depending on your activity. You will receive a notification when it's ready for download.

name: Netflix
notes: You can download your viewing history, interaction data, and payment information. The export link is typically found within your account's privacy settings under 'Download your personal information'. Data is usually available quickly.

name: Twitch
notes: Request data download from your privacy settings under 'Request My Data'. For large archives, such as extensive chat logs or broadcast history, it may take several days to be processed and made available via an email link. You can't select specific data types.

name: Discord
notes: Request your data through User Settings > Privacy & Safety > 'Request all of my Data'. The archive includes messages, attachments, user settings, and more. Processing time varies with data size; larger archives can take a few days.

name: Microsoft Account
notes: Allows you to manage and download data across various Microsoft services including Outlook, Xbox activity, search history, Edge browser data, and more. Provides granular control over data types and date ranges.

name: Amazon
notes: You can request data including orders, payment history, customer service interactions, and more from 'Request My Data' under your privacy settings. Expect email notification with download instructions. Data is typically provided within 24-48 hours.

name: Apple (Privacy Portal)
notes: Apple's Data and Privacy portal allows you to request a copy of your data across various Apple services, including iCloud, Apple ID, App Store, and more. This is a comprehensive request and can take up to 7 days for Apple to prepare your archive.

name: Adobe
notes: Access your privacy settings to request a copy of your personal data. This typically includes account information, product usage data, and content you've stored in Adobe services (e.g., Creative Cloud assets). Processing time varies based on data volume.

name: Zoom
notes: Under 'Data Management' in your account settings, you can request a copy of your data, including meeting logs, chat history, and account activity. It's usually a quick process, with download links sent via email.

name: Slack
notes: Workspace owners/admins can export data from public and private channels, direct messages, and files. Individual users can export their own message history for direct messages only. Export methods vary by plan type and role.
